column2: If an attack roll made against you is lower than your Dexterity, you can make an attack against whatever missed you at -1 without spending an action.
column3: If an attack roll made against you is lower than your Dexterity, you can make an attack against whatever missed you without spending an action.
column4: If an attack roll made against you is lower than your Dexterity, you can make an attack against whatever missed you at +1 without spending an action.
